coreNetworkId.description: The ID of the core network that a policy will be attached to and made `LIVE`.

policyDocument.description: Policy document for creating a core network. Note that updating this argument will result in the new policy document version being set as the `LATEST` and `LIVE` policy document. Refer to the [Core network policies documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/network-manager/latest/cloudwan/cloudwan-policy-change-sets.html) for more information.

state.description: Current state of a core network.
